CustomField.description: Status of the configuration snapshot which helps us to track the status of cached/caching dataset with following states Processing(cache generation is in progress), Ready(cache generation is complete and available for activation), Active(generated cached dataset is active and available for APIs/Services to use them for run time computation), Expired(cache dataset linked to configuration is no longer effective) and Aborted(cache generation is aborted halfway either due to manual intervention/application error).
CustomField.label: Status
